parameters.name: project_id

schema.description: ID of the project to delete
schema.title: Project Id

parameters.description: ID of the project to delete

get.description: Get all users and their roles within a project

schema.title: Response Get Project Memberships V1 Orgs  Organization Id  Projects  Project Id  Memberships Get

get.description: Get all available permissions for project memberships
Get the membership of a user within a project with the user's permissions.

delete.description: Remove a user from a project. Use the project deletion endpoint to remove the last user from a project.

put.description: Set a user's permissions within a project. An empty list will remove the user from the project.

get.description: Get all invitations of a user

schema.title: Response Get User Invitations V1 Me Invitations Get
Response Get Organization Memberships V1 Orgs  Organization Id  Memberships Get

delete.description: Remove a member from an organization

put.description: Update a member's permissions within an organization

parameters.name: user_id

schema.description: User ID of the member to update
schema.title: User Id

parameters.description: User ID of the member to update

schema.description: The new permissions that will be granted to the user. Any existing permissions will be overwritten.
schema.title: New Permissions

get.description: Get all pending invitations of an organization

schema.title: Response Get Invitations V1 Orgs  Organization Id  Invitations Get

post.description: Invite a member to an organization. Members must sign up first and then accept the invitation. Maximum of 10 members can be invited at a time.

schema.description: The invitations to send to the users. The email must be unique.
schema.title: Invitations
Response Invite Member V1 Orgs  Organization Id  Invitations Post

post.description: Create an application credential for a project

get.description: Get all API keys of a project

get.description: Get all available permissions for project API keys

get.summary: Get Project Api Key With Permissions
get.description: Get the permissions of an Api Key

delete.description: Delete an Api Key of a project

post.description: Authenticate an Api Key. Returns true if the Api Key is valid, false otherwise. Only to be used for internal APIs, that need to authenticate an Api Key.

schema.title: Response Authenticate Project Api Key V1 Api Keys Check Post
